definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
bright/glorious/one of the seven planets of premodern astronomy
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.chinese: 你在黑曜石公司的工作是什么？

sentences.english: In addition, the obsidian is sacred to the Maoris.
sentences.chinese: 此外，黑曜石是神圣的毛利人之物。

sentences.english: His face was covered with what may have been a funeral mask with obsidian eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上戴着一个黑曜石眼睛的面具。

sentences.english: The Aztecs made extremely sharp knives and weapons from obsidian.
sentences.chinese: 阿兹台克人从黑曜石极其锋利的刀具和武器。

sentences.english: Ancient cultures broke off pieces of obsidian to make knives and weapons such as arrows.
sentences.chinese: 古代文化断绝件黑曜石刀和武器，如箭头。

sentences.english: Hellstone and Obsidian now require at least a Demonite pick to gather.
sentences.chinese: 这下恶魔石级的镐成采黑曜石和地狱石必须品了。

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
